title: With all the new commercial and residential development in southeastern Pender County are there plans to provide county sewer services to the neighborhoods of southern Hampstead? Specifically Washington Acres and Deerfield? If so, what is the timeline?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/01/are-there-plans-in-pender-county-to-provide-sewer-service-to-southern-hampstead-specifically-washington-acres-and-deerfield/
